ja405:2.1: Appañhi etaṁ → appañca hetaṁ (sya1ed, sya2ed); appaṁsi etaṁ (mr)
ja405:2.3: sahassāni → sahassānaṁ (bj, pts-vp-pli1 sn6.4:1 [4. Bakabrahmasutta]); sahassāna (sya1ed, sya2ed, km)
ja405:7.2: Sambuddhimantaṁ → sambuddhivantaṁ (sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1); sambuddhavantaṁ (mr) | vatinaṁ → vati taṁ (sya1ed); vatitaṁ (sya2ed); vatidaṁ (mr)
